dfe23fa3-f87f-45dc-bd94-6abdaa3a9f80: Can be taken up to 3 times.
6321ce8e-3ae3-41bf-809a-98e551ee3869:
The wounds you inflict with your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} bleed, giving you renewed vigor.
You can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion (intimidate) check{/g} to demoralize an opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. While using Boar Style, whenever you tear an opponent's flesh, you make the enemy bleed for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The bleed damage dealt while using Boar Style persists even if you later switch to a different style.
e7a74bbb-3746-4900-82b1-7a7f9d73e8fb: Through constant practice, you have learned how to perform a special trick. You gain one additional rogue talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this rogue talent. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
3d83b592-faa6-485a-b05b-55f2a76c7ada: Through long practice, you have learned how to perform a special talent. You gain one additional slayer talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this slayer talent. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
9e9a768b-94e6-4074-8a5d-ca89396d8437: When you are wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon or a one-handed weapon with two hands, and using the Power Attack {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you do not suffer Power Attack's {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls on the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} you make each turn. You still suffer the penalty on any additional attacks, including {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
73dd1e33-3388-4b14-a85d-3ebcd86fef1e:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g} or piercing weapon, your opponent takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, in addition to the damage dealt by the critical hit. Bleed damage can be stopped with any magical {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}. The effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} stack.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
44cf2596-c53f-4856-af59-d7c68ae8c276:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces this to {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for 1d4 rounds. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}. The effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the duration.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
270f0b52-9ab3-421d-969b-b8298725cb13:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent takes a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for the duration of the encounter. This penalty is cumulative, but cannot reduce an opponent's natural armor bonus below 0.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
e4066f7b-dfd9-4dce-89ee-035d0e291f33: You are able to leap from hiding and strike great fear in your opponents. When you hit a {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g} opponent, you can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize that opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
072aa1c4-9bb2-4d83-94e9-11b813231989: You gain an additional wild talent. You must meet the prerequisites for this wild talent. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
d5855a1c-9762-45e4-8220-566f8f30c8a4: You have learned the secrets of a new hex. You gain one additional shaman hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
1754ae70-4062-4433-be15-ee5411c8b90f: You have learned the secrets of a new hex. You gain one additional witch hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
97e0dd2a-2fa6-4129-a18a-ce6a6e4ede34: You have made a new alchemical discovery. You gain one additional discovery. You must meet the prerequisites for this discovery. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
ce52bc09-e305-4fb7-9964-0e3caf4a1fc1: You have made a new medical discovery. You gain one additional discovery. You must meet the prerequisites for this discovery. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
7b9fcb92-3a0b-4ff7-874e-d6b72276045c: You have unlocked the secret of a new magus arcana. You gain one additional magus arcana. You must meet the prerequisites for this magus arcana. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
4e64f6ac-58b5-4452-9295-9d8e3c6c5a20:
Your anatomical insight adds deadliness to your shots.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you may make an {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}attack with a ranged weapon{/g} and add your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier on the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g}. You must be within 30 feet of your target to deal this extra damage. Creatures immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and sneak attacks are immune to this extra damage.
07b4d362-2db6-40dd-841e-6483a5ec7944: Your arcane reservoir increases by 3. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken multiple times. Its effects stack.
69449378-2570-4080-bcad-c6edd5671ba1: Your deft strikes and canny positioning control the flow of combat. When you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} to an opponent you have already damaged this {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you can impose a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on that target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against creatures other than you. The penalties stack and remain until the target misses an attack or the start of your next turn, whichever comes first.
8818aae3-ffda-450a-b5f5-2e6b71897596:
Your flesh-ripping {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} terrify your victims.
You add {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} types you can deal with your unarmed strikes. Further, you gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion (intimidate) checks{/g} to demoralize opponents. While using Boar Style, whenever you tear an opponent's flesh, you can make a Persuasion (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize that opponent as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
ff5997f8-9b04-48bd-a27d-485e25ac8693: Your ki pool increases by 2. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken multiple times. Its effects stack.
a0ea323b-029e-401b-bd39-2a5d1435fc5c: Your lay on hands ability adds an additional mercy. Select one additional mercy for which you qualify. When you use lay on hands to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to one target, it also receives the additional effects of this mercy. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
008f666f-2c69-402b-9712-ef3ef11cf001: Your repertoire of arcanist exploits expands. You gain one additional arcanist exploit. You must meet the prerequisites for this arcanist exploit. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} can be taken up to 3 times.
a31e47a1-341c-4d30-80f0-aa06eab3ec6d:
Your sharp teeth and nails rip your foes open.
You can deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and slashing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g}. While using this style, once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you hit a single foe with two or more unarmed strikes, you can tear flesh. When you do, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} extra points of damage with the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
f7a0d585-6fc3-4df1-9822-812b2ad7920f: Your shield bash causes your enemies to falter. Creatures struck by your shield bash take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
9664173f-595a-44f4-ba51-a07ba4c7e884: Your shield bash throws your enemies off balance. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you hit a creature with a shield bash, you can attempt a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against that creature at a –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. This does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
